para.para: Library routines to read and write atomic model parameters.

listitem.para: Adds a model to a linked list.
Adds a component to a linked list.
Blink * link_add (Blink **link, Bcomponent *comp1, Bcomponent *comp2, double length, double radius)
Adds a component link to a linked list.
Sets all the map file names of selected models.
Deallocates memory for a list of components.

Deallocates memory for a list of component types.
Deallocates memory for a list of component links.
Deallocates memory for a list of polygons.
Deallocates memory for links associated with a component.
Deallocates all memory in the list.
Associates a model file with a component type.
Associates a mass with a component type.
Sets the filenames of all selected component types to the given string.
Set the display radius for all components to a specific value.

para.para: Adds a component link to a linked list.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Bcomponent new component. The function allocates memory for a new link structure. If the content of the pointer is null, the new structure is the first in the list. Otherwise, the end of the list is found and the new structure added to it.

section.title: model_add()

para.para: Adds a model to a linked list.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Bmodel* new model. The function allocates memory for a new model structure. If the content of the pointer is null, the new structure is the first in the list. Otherwise, the end of the list is found and the new structure added to it.
